other_tests.findings: The liver is homogeneously hypodense, consistent with hepatic steatosis. Multiple perisplenic varices are noted, with evidence of a splenorenal shunt. The kidneys have multiple hypodense cysts with the largest cyst in the upper pole of the right kidney measuring 6.2 x 5.6 cm. The appendix is prominent, measuring up to 9 mm in diameter, with possible, minimal hyperemia of the wall.
